grill verb [T]
(COOK)
B1 to cook food over fire or hot coals, usually on a metal frame: Dad was grilling chicken in the back yard.
B1 UK (US broil) to cook something under a very hot surface in a cooker: I'll grill the bacon rather than fry it.
